column4: is there any way i can remove the swap and merge in main partition
you can repartition your drive, yes
will i need go to live mode again MK`
yes, you can't alter a partition you are using.
you made the first partition extended, drupin?
in any event you should be able to merge it with the partition after it, just make sure to back up that partition
i dont know what i did MK`
look up gparted, that's an excellent partitioning tool. It's on the liveCD
i used it the swap was 1 Gb i reduced it to 500 MB to merge in main partition
i just want to remove the swap now
how i fix this extended one
you'd need to repartition the whole drive, you can't really move an extended partition around, it'd be a bit risky.
